microprocessor.name: CSV-Based Multi-channel Data Logger
microprocessor.description: Logs data on multiple channels and exports externally to a CSV File

node.label: Data in
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Screen
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Log data
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Export
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: Clear CSV/Reconnect to server
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
-- Author: SentyFunBall -- GitHub: https://github.com/SentyFunBall -- Workshop:
--Code by STCorp. Do not reuse. -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 3031 (3386 with comment) chars aB="&values=" aA="Num " az="Empty" ay="Exported!" ax="Exporting" aw='Empty' av="bools" au="/packet?name=" at=" Label:" as="nums" ar="Bool " aq="/ping" ap="/refresh" ao=''
o=1575 P=output aa=true M=false J=property Q=input ab=math f=screen.drawText Z=ab.min K=table.insert y=string.format m=Q.getBool x=J.getText p=async.httpGet I=J.getBool L=J.getNumber h=0 q=0 v=0 H=M g="No connection" b=1 d=1 i=180 D=as z=0 N=3 C=0 t=0 X=0 V=M n=0 _={e={},c={}}k={e={},c={}}T=L("Record Nums Up to Ch:")O=L("Record Bools Up to Ch:")ag=L("Sample every n-th tick:")af=I("Convert bools to 1-0:")aj=I("Debug screen:")ah=I("Clear CSV on spawn:")p(o,aq)for a=1,T do if x(aA..a..at)==ao then k.e[a]=aw else k.e[a]=x(aA..a..at)end end for a=1,O do if x(ar..a..at)==ao then k.c[a]=aw else k.c[a]=x(ar..a..at)end end if ah then p(o,ap)end function onTick()ai=m(30)A=m(31)ad=m(32)and not ak ak=m(32)if ai and not A then h=h+1 if h%ag==0 then _.e[#_.e+1]={}_.c[#_.c+1]={}for a=1,T do if k.e[a]~=az then _.e[#_.e][a]=y("%.4f",Q.getNumber(a))end end for a=1,O do if k.c[a]~=az then if af then if m(a)then _.c[#_.c][a]=1 else _.c[#_.c][a]=0 end else _.c[#_.c][a]=tostring(m(a))end end end h=0 else _.e[#_.e+1]=_.e[#_.e]_.c[#_.c+1]=_.c[#_.c]end end if not A then n=0 q=0 end if A and g~=ay and V then z=z+1 if n<3 then if not H then g=ax G(D)H=aa else g="Waiting" h=h+1 if h>=N then H=M h=0 end end else g="Cancelled" end end if ad then p(o,aq)p(o,ap)end P.setNumber(1,z/60)P.setBool(1,g==ay)end function httpReply(an,E,F)if E:find('packet')then if F=="Values recorded" then g=ax q=q+1 n=0 else g="Failed" h=0 n=n+1 end elseif E:find('refresh')then if F~="Refreshed" then g="Refresh failed" end elseif E:find('ping')then if F=="pong" then V=aa g="Not exported" end end end function j(_,ae)local S={}for a,ac in ipairs(_)do K(S,ac[ae])end return S end function G(type)if type==as then local u={}local l=j(_.e,b)for a=d,Z(#l,d+i-1)do K(u,l[a])end d=d+i local r=Y(u)if r==ao then if#j(_.e,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else D=av d=1 b=1 G(av)end else p(o,au..k.e[b]..aB..r)v=v+1 end if d>#l+i then if#j(_.e,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else D=av d=1 b=1 G(av)end end else local u={}local l=j(_.c,b)for a=d,Z(#l,d+i-1)do K(u,l[a])end d=d+i local r=Y(u)if r==ao then if#j(_.c,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else g=ay end else p(o,au..k.c[b]..aB..r)v=v+1 end if d>#l+i then if#j(_.c,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else g=ay end end end end function Y(w)local B="" for a=1,#w do B=B..w[a]..',' end return B:sub(1,#B-1)end function U(w)local s=0 for am,W in pairs(w)do if type(W)=="table" then s=s+U(W)else s=s+1 end end return s end function onDraw()C=C+1 if C%60==0 then C=0 t=U(_)R=#j(_.e,b)if A and q>0 then al=t/R/i*R*.84 X=ab.floor((q/al)*100)end end if aj then f(1,1,g)f(1,7,"#tbl:"..t)f(1,13,"receipts:"..q)f(1,19,"sends:"..v)f(1,25,"ticks:"..h)f(1,31,"pair:"..b)f(1,37,"bch:"..d.."-"..d+i)f(1,43,"#par:"..#j(_.e,b))f(1,49,"type:"..D)f(1,55,"Attempts:"..n)else f(1,1,g)f(1,7,"Pts:"..t)f(1,14,y("ETA:%.1fs",t/((180*(60/N))/1.4)))f(1,21,y("Timer:%.1fs",z/60))f(1,27,y("%%Done:%.1f%%",X))end end

o=1575 P=output aa=true M=false J=property Q=input ab=math f=screen.drawText Z=ab.min K=table.insert y=string.format m=Q.getBool x=J.getText p=async.httpGet I=J.getBool L=J.getNumber h=0 q=0 v=0 H=M g="No connection" b=1 d=1 i=180 D=as z=0 N=3 C=0 t=0 X=0 V=M n=0 _={e={},c={}}k={e={},c={}}T=L("Record Nums Up to Ch:")O=L("Record Bools Up to Ch:")ag=L("Sample every n-th tick:")af=I("Convert bools to 1-0:")aj=I("Debug screen:")ah=I("Clear CSV on spawn:")p(o,aq)for a=1,T do if x(aA..a..at)==ao then k.e[a]=aw else k.e[a]=x(aA..a..at)end end for a=1,O do if x(ar..a..at)==ao then k.c[a]=aw else k.e[a]~=az then _.e[#_.e][a]=y("%.4f",Q.getNumber(a))end end for a=1,O do if k.c[a]~=az then if af then if m(a)then _.c[#_.c][a]=1 else _.c[#_.c][a]=0 end else _.c[#_.c][a]=tostring(m(a))end end end h=0 else _.e[#_.e+1]=_.e[#_.e]_.c[#_.c+1]=_.c[#_.c]end end if not A then n=0 q=0 end if A and g~=ay and V then z=z+1 if n<3 then if not H then g=ax G(D)H=aa else g="Waiting" h=h+1 if h>=N then H=M h=0 end end else g="Cancelled" end end if ad then p(o,aq)p(o,ap)end P.setNumber(1,z/60)P.setBool(1,g==ay)end function httpReply(an,E,F)if E:find('packet')then if F=="Values recorded" then g=ax q=q+1 n=0 else g="Failed" h=0 n=n+1 end elseif E:find('refresh')then if F~="Refreshed" then g="Refresh failed" end elseif E:find('ping')then if F=="pong" then V=aa g="Not exported" end end end function j(_,ae)local S={}for a,ac in ipairs(_)do K(S,ac[ae])end return S end function G(type)if type==as then local u={}local l=j(_.e,b)for a=d,Z(#l,d+i-1)do K(u,l[a])end d=d+i local r=Y(u)if r==ao then if#j(_.e,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else D=av d=1 b=1 G(av)end else p(o,au..k.e[b]..aB..r)v=v+1 end if d>#l+i then if#j(_.e,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else D=av d=1 b=1 G(av)end end else local u={}local l=j(_.c,b)for a=d,Z(#l,d+i-1)do K(u,l[a])end d=d+i local r=Y(u)if r==ao then if#j(_.c,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else g=ay end else p(o,au..k.c[b]..aB..r)v=v+1 end if d>#l+i then if#j(_.c,b+1)>0 then b=b+1 d=1 else g=ay end end end end function Y(w)local B="" for a=1,#w do B=B..w[a]..',' end return B:sub(1,#B-1)end function U(w)local s=0 for am,W in pairs(w)do if type(W)=="table" then s=s+U(W)else s=s+1 end end return s end function onDraw()C=C+1 if C%60==0 then C=0 t=U(_)R=#j(_.e,b)if A and q>0 then al=t/R/i*R*.84 X=ab.floor((q/al)*100)end end if aj then f(1,1,g)f(1,7,"#tbl:"..t)f(1,13,"receipts:"..q)f(1,19,"sends:"..v)f(1,25,"ticks:"..h)f(1,31,"pair:"..b)f(1,37,"bch:"..d.."-"..d+i)f(1,43,"#par:"..#j(_.e,b))f(1,49,"type:"..D)f(1,55,"Attempts:"..n)else f(1,1,g)f(1,7,"Pts:"..t)f(1,14,y("ETA:%.1fs",t/((180*(60/N))/1.4)))f(1,21,y("Timer:%.1fs",z/60))f(1,27,y("%%Done:%.1f%%",X))end end
